entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
